original_text: He gave them the land of Jazer, the towns of Gilead and half the land of the Ammonites. Their land went as far as Aroer, a town which was near Rabbah.
korean_text: 그들의 지역은 야셀과 길르앗 모든 성읍과 암몬 자손의 땅 절반 곧 랍바 앞의 아로엘까지와

sentences.original_text: He gave them the land of Jazer
and half the land of the Ammonites
Their land went as far as Aroer
a town which was near Rabbah
